meanings.definition: A group of people living together in an organized community.
meanings.sent1: In some societies, people work together to build houses.
meanings.sent2: Many different societies have their own traditions and customs.
meanings.sent3: The societies in this town have a friendly competition for the best garden.
meanings.sent4: The bond between members of the society is what holds their societies together.
meanings.sent5: Learning about different societies around the world can be fascinating.

meanings.definition: The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community.
meanings.sent1: Various societies have different ways of governing themselves.
meanings.sent2: Urban societies often face challenges with overcrowding.
meanings.sent3: The societies of ants and bees are known for their teamwork.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, human societies are just a small part of nature.
meanings.sent5: The diversity within societies enriches the overall community.

meanings.definition: An organization or club formed for a particular purpose or activity.
meanings.sent1: She joined the astronomy society to learn more about the stars.
meanings.sent2: The local historical society preserves artifacts from the past.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate lovers' society meets every Friday for tastings.
meanings.sent4: Being part of a society dedicated to helping others can be fulfilling.
meanings.sent5: The society of artists organized a gallery to showcase their work.
